title: Gyromancer
notes: Game visuals, audio & gameplay work fine. However, about half the words (or even letters of it) are hidden...kind of like in the game yosumin. This isn't a game that requires much text input, but still hinders things more than you'd expect.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Note: tested on the same computer as the 'silver' mentioning for this game 5 days ago, but with linux mint & kernel updated. This solved that issue (now works perfect)
